Package cz.vse.java.connections.utils

Interface ISSConnectionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RouterClientsManagement, ServiceClientsManagement, ServicesManagement
    public interface ISSConnectionManager

    The interface of ISSConnectionManager is used to contain all methods of the type to be overriden (implemented).

    Definition of any Server-Side Connection Manager.

    Written for project "Connections2".
    Version:
    02. 04. 2020 .vse.java.connections
    Author:
    Vojtěch Pavlů

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addMessageHandler​(IHandler handler)
      Adds message handler - the connection is gonna be able to use this handler.
      void addToken​(Token token)
      Adds the token to the TokenContainer for future token validation.
      ServiceReference getServiceReference()
      Builds the ServiceReference instance.
      boolean validateToken​(IConnection connection, Token token)
      Validates the token against the given and saved ones.

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceReference

        ServiceReference getServiceReference()

        Builds the ServiceReference instance.

        Returns:
        the service reference for creating the connection usage

      • addMessageHandler

        void addMessageHandler​(IHandler handler)

        Adds message handler - the connection is gonna be able to use this handler.

        Parameters:
        handler - handler to be added.

      • validateToken

        boolean validateToken​(IConnection connection,
                      Token token)

        Validates the token against the given and saved ones.

        Parameters:
        connection - to be set to use the given token only if it corresponds and is valid.
        token - to be set to the connection, if it is valid.
        Returns:
        the result of validity test

      • addToken

        void addToken​(Token token)

        Adds the token to the TokenContainer for future token validation.

        Parameters:
        token - token
